Upper.description: This is a fitted, cropped cream-colored blouse made of a textured fabric, featuring a pointed collar and dramatically flared bell sleeves, all outlined with a delicate black, wavy contrast trim.

Lower.description: A pair of beige pants with a relaxed silhouette.
